description: Sushi Focus daemon auto-starter and context bridge

hooks.command: curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/need-input -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId":"claude-code-session","question":"User input required","choices":[]}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true

curl -s -X POST http://127.0.0.1:41593/agent/done -H 'Content-Type: application/json' ${SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET:+-H "Authorization: Bearer $SUSHI_FOCUS_SECRET"} -d '{"taskId":"claude-code-session","summary":"Session ended"}' > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
